statements: DELETE FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE id = 1 AND route_name = 'Route A';

DELETE FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE route_id = 10 AND date = '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM service_efficiency WHERE on_time_performance < 90 AND route_id = 15;
